summary:
...PILAR DRIFTING NORTHWARD BUT FORECAST TO BEGIN MOVING WESTWARD TOMORROW... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING ONGOING FOR PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Tue Oct 31
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.9, -89.4
 with movement N at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
